alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Northern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 3:18PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Atkinson and northwestern Ware Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 318 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pearson. This storm was moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Pearson, Millwood and Axson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.
